Pre-Game Insights: Daniel Schneemann has replaced Steven Kwan as the leadoff batter and left fielder in manager Stephen Vogt’s lineup. Kwan is a late scratch with the reason for his removal still unclear.
The game is scheduled to take place at Progressive Field at 7:10 p.m. ET.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports Great Lakes, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, WARF 1350 AM (Spanish) and the Guardians Radio Network.
Starting pitchers for the game are RHP Tanner Bibee (11-7, 3.56) for the Guardians and RHP Zack Littell (6-9, 3.89) for the Rays.
